kerala_budget_2026_27_engagement_highlig.title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: Top 30 Highlights for the Common Man
kerala_budget_2026_27_engagement_highlig.description: A curated list of high-impact schemes, welfare measures, and financial updates designed for maximum public interest.

items.headline: Free Degree Education
items.details: Tuition fees waived for all students in Government and Aided Arts & Science Colleges.
items.impact: Major relief for parents of college-going students.

items.headline: Mid-Day Meal Scheme
items.details: Continued support for nutritious meals in schools.
items.impact: Ensures food security for school children.

items.headline: Scholarships for Marginalized (Unnathiyilekku)
items.details: Special financial aid for SC/ST/OEC students pursuing higher education.
items.impact: Support for students from disadvantaged backgrounds.

items.headline: Social Security Pension
items.details: Massive allocation to ensure monthly pension payments for the elderly, widows, and disabled.
items.impact: Direct financial support to vulnerable citizens.

items.headline: Elderly Care (Vayomithram Plus)
items.details: Revamped scheme providing home-based palliative care and medical aid for seniors living alone.
items.impact: Better health support for the aging population.

items.headline: Gig Workers Welfare Fund
items.details: New social security fund for delivery partners (Swiggy, Zomato, etc.) and cab drivers.
items.impact: Accident insurance and medical benefits for platform workers.

items.headline: Kudumbashree Support
items.details: Funding for women's neighborhood groups and micro-enterprises.
items.impact: Empowerment and income generation for women.

items.headline: Market Intervention (Price Control)
items.details: Funds allocated to Supplyco to sell essential goods at subsidized rates.
items.impact: Helps control inflation and grocery bills.

items.headline: Consumerfed Subsidy
items.details: Support for consumer cooperatives to provide affordable goods.

items.headline: Housing for All (LIFE Mission)
items.details: State plan allocation to build homes for the homeless.

items.headline: Rubber Price Hike
items.details: Rubber support price increased to ‚Çπ200/kg; Price Stability Fund allocated.

items.headline: Paddy Procurement
items.details: Funds to buy paddy from farmers at a support price.

items.headline: Coconut Replanting Mission
items.details: Scheme to plant 1 crore new coconut seedlings.

items.headline: Human-Wildlife Conflict Solution
items.details: Funds for electric fences, trenches, and compensation for wildlife attacks.
items.impact: Safety for farmers and forest-fringe residents.

items.headline: Vegetable Development
items.details: Promotion of comprehensive vegetable farming.

items.headline: Nalam Health Mission
items.details: Universal screening for lifestyle diseases (BP, Sugar, Cancer) for everyone above 30.
items.impact: Early detection and better public health.

items.headline: Public Health Infrastructure
items.details: Allocation for medical assistance and public health services.

items.headline: Regional Cancer Centre Support
items.details: Continued upgrade of cancer care facilities.

items.headline: KSRTC Revival
items.details: Financial assistance to keep the state public transport running.

items.headline: Better Roads
items.details: PWD road maintenance and upgrades using rubberized bitumen.

items.headline: SilverLine Project
items.details: Funds for preliminary works and land acquisition liaison.

items.headline: Vizhinjam Industrial Corridor
items.details: Development of industrial areas around the new port.

items.headline: Sabarimala Master Plan
items.details: Infrastructure improvements for the pilgrimage site.

items.headline: Punargeham (Fishermen Rehab)
items.details: Housing and rehabilitation for fishermen living in danger zones.

items.headline: Liquor Cess
items.details: ‚Çπ20 Social Security Cess on IMFL bottles costing above ‚Çπ500.

items.headline: Green Tax on Old Vehicles
items.details: Higher tax on private vehicles older than 15 years.
items.impact: Encourages scraping old cars; costlier to keep vintage cars.

items.headline: Land Tax Revision
items.details: Moderate increase in basic land tax rates.
items.impact: Slight increase in property ownership costs.

items.headline: Tax Amnesty Scheme
items.details: One-time settlement for old VAT/Sales Tax arrears.
items.impact: Chance for businesses to clear old dues without penalty.
